column5: Well, I think I am just about done modding the boat for the year just gotta get some rob holders in....   Two sets of "Grippers" for bouys or fish baskets etc..    Cleats for the Anchor    The Substructure..   Washed out.. Just needed to grab the leaves..   Ahhhh the Floor... Dont know why it looks so warped in this shot...   Here the Floor has been installed. The dark marks around the screws is just saw dust.   Needed to work out a couple winkles in the deck after I installed it.. not a big issue just apply a bit of pressure   Cliff, gonna be comfortable enough for yah?  Now.. to plan the back floor...  Gerritt.
WTG Gerritt Coming along great it looks like...

Gerritt...you are doing some great work there!  It'll be so much more rewarding because you are doing the work yourself.  Things are coming along great and I cant wait to see you bring a fish into it!  It's looking plenty comfortable bud!  Oh yeah...you think a few of these would work ok???

Looks awesome bud !!!!!!! your boat will look great when you are finished,now all you have to do is get it to smell like fish..LOL..LOL     the way a fishing boat should smell...how is the decision about the rod holders comming along...did you get the pm i sent you...cheers

Great job, looks great. Did my boat about 10 years ago now and still holding out. I coated all my plywood with a stain, (payed cheap for stain cause it was an ugly color, but it got covered with carpet, so didn't matter) That outdoor carpet I used is sure durable.
Looking good bud so good I am going to have to make a casting deck myself on my boat.Now its time to slime the boat.  MTP

Thanks for the replies guys.. I was pushed to get it finished for a trip I am making next week, I am headed up to Trout Lake on Saturday for almost a week of R&R... she'll get slimed.... ohhhh yes she'll get slimed..  I am still mulling over the rod holders Shaun... trying to find the perfect set for my boat without breaking the bank on accessories..  Cliff that chair have vibrating/heat and massage?  LOL  Gerritt.
